mapper.select: SELECT a.dob_code, a.user_code, a.dob_img, a.dob_nickname, a.dob_content, a.dob_area, a.dob_career_days, b.apply_career, c.day_week, c.dob_code FROM tbl_dobby a JOIN tbl_dob_apply b on(a.user_code = b.user_code) JOIN tbl_workday c on(a.dob_code = c.dob_code) WHERE a.user_code= #{userCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_dobby SET dob_img = #{dobImg}, dob_nickname = #{dobNickname}, dob_content = #{dobContent}, dob_area = #{dobArea}, dob_career_days = #{dobCareerDays} WHERE user_code = #{userCode}
